in-246591f7977da409,indeed,https://ca.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=246591f7977da409,https://www.yelp.careers/us/en/job/YELPUS13495EXTERNALENUS/Lead-Product-Manager-Ads-Auction-and-Measurement-Remote-Canada?utm_source=indeed&utm_medium=phenom-feeds,Lead Product Manager - Ads Auction and Measurement (Remote - Canada),Yelp,"Remote, CA",2025-06-03,fulltime,,,,,,True,,,,-recruiting@yelp.com,"**Summary**

Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we‚Äôre a cooperative team that values individual authenticity and encourages creative solutions to problems. All new engineers deploy working code their first week, and we strive to broaden individual impact with support from managers, mentors, and teams. At the end of the day, we‚Äôre all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.

Yelp connects people with great local businesses. Our platform is powered by a vibrant community contributing reviews and engaging with local businesses daily. We monetize primarily through advertising, helping millions of businesses connect with high\-intent consumers. The Ads Auction system sits at the heart of this exchange, determining which ads are shown for every opportunity.

The Ads Marketplace team is responsible for the core engine that drives Yelp's advertising business. We develop and optimize the sophisticated auction, bidding, and pacing systems that balance advertiser value (ROI), consumer experience, and Yelp's monetization goals. We work at the intersection of economics, machine learning, and large\-scale systems engineering.

As the Lead Product Manager for Ads Auction and Measurement, you will own the product strategy and execution for Yelp's core ad auction, bidding, pricing, budget pacing mechanisms, and corresponding measurements. This is a highly technical leadership role where you will guide the evolution of algorithms and systems that make real\-time decisions maximizing value across multiple stakeholders. You will define how we measure the performance and impact of these complex systems, focusing on both short\-term efficiency and long\-term impact. You will partner closely with world\-class engineering and applied science teams to design, experiment, implement, and iterate on auction dynamics and the metrics that guide our progress.

This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada. We‚Äôd love to have you apply, even if you don‚Äôt feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we‚Äôre looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.**What you'll do:**
* Foster and build a fun, diverse, and inclusive culture that reflects Yelp‚Äôs values.

* **Auction Strategy \& Roadmap:** Define and drive the product roadmap for Yelp's ads auction, bidding algorithms, pricing mechanisms, and budget pacing systems, ensuring alignment with business objectives and competitive dynamics. Identify key levers for optimization and innovation.

* **Algorithm \& System Optimization:** Partner deeply with Engineering and Data Science to design, develop, and refine the auction\-based ad selection system. Translate advertiser goals (ROI, leads, conversions), user experience, and monetization considerations into algorithmic requirements, and prioritize initiatives based on concrete data and expected impact.

* **Auction Measurement \& Evaluation:** Define and own the key metrics framework for evaluating auction health, efficiency, and the business impact. Drive the development of robust measurement for complex trade\-offs (e.g., relevance vs. monetization, short\-term vs. long\-term effects). Design and interpret large\-scale A/B tests.

* **Independent Data Analysis:** Conduct hands\-on analysis of large\-scale auction and advertising datasets using tools like SQL and Python to uncover optimization opportunities, validate hypotheses, understand performance drivers, and inform product decisions.
* **Technical Product Development:** Lead the end\-to\-end product lifecycle for auction\-related features and improvements, from ideation and requirements definition through launch and iteration.

* **Cross\-Functional Leadership:** Serve as the product leader for the auction domain, collaborating effectively with Engineering, Data Science, Sales, Finance, and other Product teams. Communicate complex technical concepts and trade\-offs clearly to diverse audiences.
* **Drive Business Impact:** Directly influence Yelp's revenue and advertiser success by improving the efficiency and effectiveness of the core ad marketplace.
**What it takes to succeed:**

* **Experience:** 5\+ years of technical product management experience, preferably focused on auctions, bidding systems, search ranking, or monetization platforms within the online advertising (AdTech) industry.

* **Auction \& Optimization Expertise:** Strong theoretical understanding and practical experience with auction theory (e.g., VCG, GSP), optimization algorithms, statistical modeling, and machine learning concepts relevant to ad targeting and ranking.

* **Advanced Analytical \& Data Skills:** Proven ability to independently query, manipulate, and analyze large, complex datasets. Proficiency with SQL and data analysis tools/languages (e.g., Python, R) is required.

* **Statistical Rigor:** Deep understanding of applied statistics, experimental design (A/B testing), causal inference, and methods for measuring statistical significance and inferring long\-term impact.
* **Educational Background:** Strong quantitative background
column2: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, Operations Research, Mathematics, or a related field is highly preferred.

column1: * **Technical Fluency:** Ability to engage deeply with engineers and data scientists on technical details of algorithms, system design, and data infrastructure.
* **Communication \& Collaboration:** Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to influence technical and non\-technical stakeholders across various functions.
* **Problem Solving:** Strong structured thinking and problem\-solving abilities, capable of breaking down complex problems into actionable components.
**What you'll get:**
* Compensation range is $155,000\-233,000 annually. Depending on your role and level, you may also be offered a bonus, restricted stock units, and benefits.
* This opportunity has the option to be fully remote in all locations across Canada.

li-4250284894,linkedin,https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/4250284894,,Lead Data Scientist,Duetto,"Austin, TX",2025-06-28,fulltime,,,,,,False,director,Engineering and Information Technology,,,"**The Company:**

We are an ambitious, well\-funded, high\-growth global technology company transforming the hotel industry. At Duetto, we are passionate about creating innovative analytical solutions to help hoteliers thrive. Although we work hard, the work atmosphere is casual, flexible, collaborative, and most of all, fun.

Duetto offers an open and collaborative work environment and believes that by cultivating a team with diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences, it will continue to lead the industry with its cutting\-edge platform\-based hospitality technology.
**Introduction**

We are seeking a Lead Data Scientist with deep expertise in pricing science, including reinforcement learning and mathematical optimization, to drive the next generation of our dynamic pricing engine.

In this role, you will lead the development of ML systems that learn optimal pricing strategies for thousands of hotels, dynamically adapting to demand signals, business constraints, and market changes.

You'll collaborate closely with engineering and product teams to design models that move beyond our legacy pricing approaches‚Äîenabling context\-aware, self\-learning price policies that deliver measurable revenue impact.

This is an opportunity for a hands\-on, full\-stack data scientist who thrives in ambiguity, has strong modeling intuition, and is energized by the challenge of building intelligent systems at scale in a complex, real\-world domain.
**Key Responsibilities:**
* Lead the development of intelligent pricing systems using reinforcement learning, constrained optimization, and simulation\-based approaches.

* Apply a combination of mathematical optimization, dynamic programming, and advanced reinforcement learning algorithms (e.g., model\-free, policy gradients, model\-based RL) to develop adaptive pricing strategies at scale.
* Incorporate price elasticity modeling, demand forecasts, and business constraints into the optimization framework.
* Build and validate simulation environments to evaluate policies offline and ensure robustness before production deployment.
* Collaborate with engineering to productionize and monitor models in cloud environments such as AWS SageMaker.
* Collaborate with engineering to productionize optimization models via batch or real\-time pricing APIs (e.g., using AWS SageMaker).
* Partner with product, pricing, and revenue strategy teams to define objectives and translate pricing insights into business outcomes.
* Define and execute model performance measurement strategies, including causal inference and uplift modeling and A/B testing
* Present findings, experimental results, and strategic recommendations to senior leadership.
**Qualifications**
* **MS or PhD**
in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Operations Research, or a related quantitative field.
of hands\-on experience building data science solutions for pricing, decision\-making, or control systems.
* Demonstrated success applying reinforcement learning in production settings, ideally in pricing or dynamic decision environments.
* Proficiency with ML/DL frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit\-learn, DARTS) and programming languages (Python, R, SQL)..
* Experience with Python\-based libraries for mathematical optimization and reinforcement learning, and familiarity with simulation environments for offline policy evaluation
* Familiarity with cloud platforms and MLOps tools (e.g., AWS SageMaker, MLflow) for scalable model development and deployment.
* Strong communication and presentation skills, capable of conveying complex analytical concepts to non\-technical stakeholders.
* Prior experience in the hospitality, travel, or revenue management domain is highly desirable.
**Experience designing model evaluation and impact measurement frameworks, including causal inference.**
**About Duetto:**

Duetto delivers a suite of SaaS cloud\-native applications for hospitality businesses to optimize every booking opportunity for greater revenue impact. The unique combination of hospitality experience and technology leadership drives Duetto to look for innovative solutions to industry challenges. The software as a service platform allows hotels, casinos, and resorts to leverage real\-time dynamic data sources and actionable insights into pricing and demand across the enterprise. Our Business Model and Values

Arbitrage Investment AG is an investment and holding company focused on innovative and long\-term growth markets. Our portfolio spans a variety of sectors including fintech services, renewable energies, biotechnology, medical technology, and advanced artificial intelligence. We aim to consistently grow and innovate through risk\-averse arbitrage strategies and diversified investment management.

Our subsidiaries are industry leaders, characterized by their economic efficiency and forward\-thinking nature. Sustainable development and the long\-term success of these companies are at the heart of our actions. We play an active role in managing, supporting, and advancing our investments to enhance their growth and, when necessary, support their expansion and internationalization.

In collaboration with the management and employees of our subsidiaries, we position ourselves as strategic partners and catalysts. We leverage our extensive experience and expertise to promote synergies and facilitate idea sharing and cooperation among our companies in areas such as research and development, HR management, and talent development.

Despite our close collaboration, it is important to us to maintain the autonomy of our subsidiaries. Their success is based on the competence and dedication of outstanding professionals. With our experienced consultancy, we stand by their side to help achieve common goals and explore new market opportunities.
This is what defines us: Arbitrage Investment AG ‚Äì Innovative, sustainable, and forward\-looking, committed to developing markets and technologies that will shape the world of tomorrow.
